subject: Start spring off right, 16 SUPER Premium cigars 1 low price
body:
This advertisement is being sent by a 
third-party where you have consented to receive updates, offers or 
promotions.
   To opt-out or unsubscribe, please follow the instructions at the 
bottom of this e-mail















In the event that we are temporarily out of stock of a cigar 
featured in this special promotion, Thompson Cigar reserves the 
right to substitute with another cigar of equal or greater value. 
Your satisfaction is guaranteed. Limit of 2 per customer. 
   Due to state tobacco legislation, Thompson Cigar cannot ship into 
the state of MAINE.
 OFFER NOT AVAILABLE TO MINORS and ONLY GOOD IN THE USA.
 This offer and e-mail have not been sent to you by Thompson Cigar, 
but by a third-party from where you may have opted-in to receive 
updates. 
     To opt-out or unsubscribe from this third party, please follow the 
instructions below.
 To end emails from Thompson Cigar e-mails,

visit here




Use this link to be automatically removed from any future offers


If you do not wish to receive any more offers from via e-mail, please write us with your removal request.  Customer Service 560- A F ST #438 Grants Pass, OR 97528.Please note: It may take up to 3 days for your name to be removed from our list.
